# authorizationCode

**Instance Property**

A token that the app uses to interact with the server.

## Declaration

```swift
var authorizationCode: Data? { get }
```

## Discussion

Your app uses this short-lived token as proof that it has authorization to interact with the server.

The system encodes the object as a string using [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUTF8StringEncoding].

## Identifying a User

- **identityToken**: A JSON Web Token (JWT) that securely communicates information about the user to the app.
- **state**: An arbitrary string that your app provides to the request that generates the credential.
- **user**: An identifier for the authenticated user.
